TopicTitle: Played from .15 to .19 now I'm back!

Articles.Content:
It was 3:42am last night, a work night. My wife had long since fallen asleep, exhausted from mocking my excitement at my KSP accomplishments. Yet there I was, eyes wide, and mind racing about design enhancements to my various craft and missions. I thought to myself "WHY ON SQUAD'S GREEN KERBIN DID I EVER STOP PLAYING THIS GAME!??"

So: Hi everyone. Psyched to be back! Sad to have lost my old forum profile.

Edited January 30, 2014 by Sir Deimos

Welcome back!

What was your old forum account?

It was the same name, Sir Deimos. It seems to be gone, which is ok seeing as I almost never used it. I think it was still a bottle rocketeer, but I'm sure it had one or two treasures locked in the history.
Welcome back! It's even better now. Check out RAPIER engines, they are a ton of fun.

Sir Deimos, the reason of you account disappearing might be the Great Kraken Attack: the Kraken attacked this forum and, despite the fight of all the community and the sysadmin, many account and whole thread were lost.

Never forget!

That's a real shame. I remember some pretty mind boggling threads. Some guy once calculated launch windows for single burn bulls-eyes of all possible other bodies, one of which was 2 sec long. Who ever heard of such a thing!!? Then there was Ginsweater's modular floating Laythe base. Insanity!

I will never forget!

Can't wait to see and make some new threads to fill the void.

Welcome back. If I have my dates correct, you have yet to see the creations of whackjob...

they are... different.
